desc: This is our premium unuisex (for men and women) t-shirt . We use 100% ringspun cotton yarn knitted on a 28g knitting machine. This allows for a very fine soft knit. Made in South Africa.

layout.text: mudu clothing - made for people on the move
mudu means roots in Sepedi which represents grounded and cultured individuals, the artwork of our logo is adapted from an Andrinkra symbolism meaning affluence and wealth
